narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Hda Ny LLC is a Home Health provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $113.3M in Medicaid payments across 501K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $113.3M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,161 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
